question: 役目
sourceMnemonic: If you have an <kanji>eye</kanji> for <kanji>service</kanji>, then you always think helping people is your <vocabulary>duty</vocabulary>! If you see it, then you offer your service. It's the right thing to do!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for <ja>役</ja> and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>目</ja>. You've learned them both so you should be able to read this word too!
